definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
to strive for/to vie for/to argue or debate/deficient or lacking (dialect)/how or what (literary)

sentences.english: Our textbook only skims the surface of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教科書對越南戰爭的描述只是輕描淡寫。

sentences.english: The Vietnam War was one of hot wars under the Cold War background.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭是冷戰大背景下的一場熱戰。

sentences.english: Our textbook only skims the surface of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教科書只大略地帶過越南戰爭。

sentences.english: Military enthusiasts begin re-enacting Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 軍事狂人重演越南戰爭遊戲。

sentences.english: Vietnam War has consumed American resources constantly.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭不斷地消耗着美國的資源。

sentences.english: On the Impact of Vietnam War on American Economy;
sentences.chinese: 美蘇兩強一個臺前，一個幕後都捲入了越南戰爭。

sentences.english: Its use in the Vietnam War became highly controversial.
sentences.chinese: 在越南戰爭中使用凝固汽油引起了強烈的爭論。

sentences.english: US in North Korean and in Vietnam War clock use biological weapon.
sentences.chinese: 美國在朝鮮和越南戰爭中都鍾使用生物武器。

sentences.english: The war of Vietnams was constantly used up the American's resources.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭不斷消耗着美國的資源。

sentences.english: Both two powers U S and USSR were involved in the Vietnamese War directly or indirectly.
sentences.chinese: 美蘇兩強一個臺前，一個幕後都捲入了越南戰爭。

sentences.english: The government in Canberra wants to avoid a repeat of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 堪培拉政府希望避免重複越南戰爭的局面。

sentences.english: The city was bombed heavily during the Vietnam War. Population, 89,93.
sentences.chinese: 在越南戰爭中該市遭到狂轟亂炸。

sentences.english: The city was bombed heavily during the Vietnam War. Population, 819,913.
sentences.chinese: 在越南戰爭中該市遭到狂轟亂炸。

sentences.english: In Vietnam, it wanted to keep Richard Nixon from doing too much.
sentences.chinese: 在越南戰爭，國會想阻止尼克松作更多努力。

sentences.english: Vietnam War has constantly consumed the American resource.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭不斷地消耗着美國的資源。

sentences.english: Today the war is the second longest in American history, after Vietnam.
sentences.chinese: 此次戰爭是繼越南戰爭之後美國曆史上最常的戰爭。

definition: Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty
Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 He2 ping2 jiang3

definition: Leningrad, name of Russian city Saint Petersburg 聖彼得堡|圣彼得堡 1923-1991
East Germany (1945-1990)/German Democratic Republic 德意志民主共和國|德意志民主共和国[De2 yi4 zhi4 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2]

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4
